content.raw:
It would be good to make it clear to the user that they successfully added the path. Ideally, there'd be a notification but we're not set up yet with notifications for Gazebo. 

Can you collapse all folders once the user has selected the new path? That way it's easier to find the new folder in the list. 
Also, are you able to list the new path at the top of the list?
